name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: This was a simple website I made using only JQuery/JavaScript to create a came of Rock/Paper/Scissors

name: jnd travel
description: jnd travel is a Travel site that I made for my significant using the Static Site Generator Jekyll.

name: Furry Friend Finder
description: Furry Friend Finder was an application I built using Python, Flask, and front end languages. The site uses the Petfinder API to ask you a few questions about what kind of dog you are looking for, and provides 5 dogs availabile for adoption near you.

name: Meme-A-Day
description: A Simple website built with Python/Flask that provides a popular meme from a few Reddit Subreddits from the day.

name: Wedding Website
description: Instead of using a tradition RSVP website, I built our own site by hand for our Wedding. I used HTML,CSS, and some JavaScript. Hosting it via a Ubuntu VM running NGINX
